name: SAMA (Oculus Quest Version)
description:
SAMA is a fast paced hoverbike VR racing game built for Oculus Quest/Rift.

I'm trying to get better at C#/Unity3D while working on this project and definitely am a newbie regarding must have/must do of racing games.. I'm going with the flow and having fun revisiting memories from Rocket Jockey, Cool Boarders 2, SSX, Wipeout, Radial-G, etc. I hope you will have fun too!

Check Devlog page for more info. New apk posted daily!

Download the apk and sideload SAMA on your Oculus Quest with SideQuest.  Any feedback is much appreciated as I'm actively working on this project this summer (2022).

SAMA started as a VR sandbox/fan art of the TOKiMONSTA's "Lune Rouge" experience created by The WaveVR back in 2017 (video here).  Music credits go to ZapSplat (here).

Puffs, az
